code: import ExternalLink from"../../assets/images/project-external.png";import GithubRepo from"../../assets/images/project-source.png";import{ProjectsPreviewData}from"../../data/ProjectsData";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var ProjectsPreview=function ProjectsPreview(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:" portfolio-grid",children:ProjectsPreviewData.map(function(project,index){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"project",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:project.img,alt:project.name,className:"project-img"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"project-description",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"white-text p-tag",children:project.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"project-meta-stack ",children:project.stack.map(function(stackName,index){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:stackName},index);})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"project-links",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:project.src,target:"_blank",rel:"noreferrer",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:ExternalLink,alt:"External link icon"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:project.source,target:"_blank",rel:"noreferrer",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:GithubRepo,alt:"Github icon"})})]})]})]},index);})});};export default ProjectsPreview;
